Plot: Out on parole after 8 years inside Bill Hayward returns home to find his now 11 and 15 year old sons abandoned by their mother and fending for themselves. Unwilling to play Dad, an uncaring...
Title: Wild Bill
Actors: Charlie Creed-Miles, Will Poulter, Sammy Williams, Iwan Rheon
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
